name: video_on_hover_elementor
title: Video on Hover
description: Add motion to your designs with the Video on Hover Widget – instantly play a video when users hover over an image or section for a dynamic, engaging effect.

options.description: Add motion to your designs with the Video on Hover Widget – instantly play a video when users hover over an image or section for a dynamic, engaging effect.

params.title: Video URL
params.name: video_url
params.description: MP4, WEBM or OGV video link

params.title: Show Hover State
params.name: debug_hover_state
params.description: Enable this option to display the hidden content. This makes it easier to style and customize without needing to hover repeatedly during the design process.
